tasks.description: Add ProductResponseV2 type with priceInCents and formattedPrice fields, and add deprecation JSDoc to price field in ProductResponseV1 in src/types/product.ts
Add deprecation comment/annotation to the price field in the v1 products handler response in src/routes/products-v1.ts
Create new GET /api/v2/products/:id endpoint in src/routes/products-v2.ts that returns priceInCents and formattedPrice instead of the deprecated price field
Add tests for both v1 (verifying backwards compatibility and deprecation) and v2 (verifying new response format) endpoints in test/routes/products.test.ts
